title: BRIEF-Wynn Resorts Announces Commencement Of Consent Solicitation By Wynn Las Vegas, Llc And Wynn Las Vegas Capital Corp

organizations.name: brief-wynn resorts announces commencement of consent sol

text: Market News  21 AM / Updated 18 minutes ago BRIEF-Wynn Resorts Announces Commencement Of Consent Solicitation By Wynn Las Vegas, Llc And Wynn Las Vegas Capital Corp Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 15 (Reuters) - Wynn Resorts Ltd: * WYNN RESORTS ANNOUNCES COMMENCEMENT OF CONSENT SOLICITATION BY WYNN LAS VEGAS, LLC AND WYNN LAS VEGAS CAPITAL CORP. * WYNN RESORTS - ‍COMMENCED SOLICITATION OF CONSENTS TO PROPOSED AMENDMENT TO INDENTURE GOVERNING ISSUERS’ 4.25% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2023​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
